meanings.definition: The quality or state of being strange or abnormal.
meanings.sent1: Her freakishness stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The freakishness of the situation made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent3: His freakishness in wearing mismatched socks always made us smile.
meanings.sent4: The freakishness of the abandoned house gave it an eerie vibe.
meanings.sent5: The freakishness of the clown's makeup was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The sudden freakishness of the storm surprised us all.
meanings.sent2: The freakishness of the comet's appearance fascinated astronomers.
meanings.sent3: The freakishness of the talking parrot made us burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The freakishness of the shooting star left us in awe.
meanings.sent5: The freakishness of the double rainbow was a rare sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of a freak.
meanings.sent1: His freakishness in the circus amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The freakishness of the acrobat's performance left us speechless.
meanings.sent3: The clown's freakishness in juggling bananas made us chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The freakishness of the magician's tricks wowed the children.
meanings.sent5: The freakishness of the contortionist's act was unbelievable.
